channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Multiple potholes (long and wide), 13th May
item.description:
Multiple potholes on Bath Road between Kew Place and Thirlestaine Road. Pothole size (approximate) are: 8m x 10cm - this one is hazardous to bicycles, and stretches into the intersection. 2m x 40cm 1.2m x 20cm 80cm x 20cm 30cm x 10cm

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fairfield Parade, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loads of pot holes, 13th May
item.description:
From the end of Swallow crescent (near Innsworth community centre) from no 34 Rookery road. There are numerous pot holes. All around the corner and they continue around the bend by number 54/56 Rookery road. Theyâ€™re getting bigger.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rookery Road, Innsworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light not working, 13th May
item.description:
Gamecock Close
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Typhoon Way, Upton St. Leonards, Stroud
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pathway with over grown hedege ....still, 13th May
item.description:
Hi reporting again (1st reported last year) as the bush is growing... huge obstruction. Awful at school times, prams, children and adults having difficulties. It's also on a corner by a busy road. Also you can't see who is walking round the bush in the evenings. Sorry but how can they be allowed to do this on a public highway..

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Caernarvon Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There are numerous potholes on this stretch. Some are on the side and some in the rd., 13th May
item.description:
The worst of it is to the left of the golf course as you exit. Between there and the junction to the A436
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ullenwood Manor Lane, Coberley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Edging of road to grass verge had eroded . Road limited width have to drive near edge for safety, 13th May
item.description:
Approx 200 yards up from Court Farm shop - travelling tiwards Stone Orchard . I wish to make a claim for major puncture to front tyre, caused by this pothole / erosion

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stoke Road, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Crumbling pavement with loose chippings and muddy patches, 13th May
item.description:
The pavement on the corner of Green lane and Billbrook Road is in very poor condition. It's crumbling and uneven with loose chippings, mud patches when wet and vegetation growing through. It's been getter gradually worse over the last 5 years

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21, Green Lane, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: X2 orange armchairs fly tipped, 13th May
item.description:
Walk up the public footpath off Beeches Rs. Continue on straight up the hill, through 2 gates. You will then see a newly installed wooden handrail ahead. Continue up the hill and slightly to your left, you will see a big tree, looks like it's dying. The armchairs are beneath the tree. Arson risk in drier hot weather. Evidence of fires next to armchairs.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Timbercombe Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
